name: Mushroom Labyrinth
description:
Created for the 2022 A Game by it's Cover Jam, and based on the Famicase design by Alec Whitmore, I drew and coded this game in under 2 weeks. I really wish I had been able to animate some effects and extend some portions (softly weeps over folder of designs and maps), but I'm overall pretty happy with how it turned out. 

I hope you enjoy your time in the Labyrinth, with these silly characters.
